settings.title: Settings
settings.support_desc: Use support for disputes (e.g. The opponent rejects the result repeatedly without justified reason). An admin will intervene and ensure a fair outcome and correct result. You can also request longer subscription plans here.
settings.delete_account_desc: This action is permanent. All your data from your profile will be deleted.
settings.usernameTakenMessage: That username is already taken. Please choose another one.
settings.install_app_desc: Add PadelUp to your home screen for the best experience.
settings.elo_desc:
The system calculates win probability based on the **Team ELO Average**, rewarding wins against stronger opponents.

 Second adjust the K-Factor, which is a factor that adjusts the amount of points assigned to a player for a win. .
settings.elo_placement: Start between(0-10) games: K=48 (Fast adjustment to find real level).
settings.elo_note: Note: Points are assigned **individually**. In the same match, a new player might gain +40 pts while their veteran partner gains +20.

auth.no_account: Don't have an account? Sign Up
auth.has_account: Already have an account? Sign In
auth.password_short: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.password_updated: Password updated successfully! You will be redirected to the home page.

errors.email_not_found: Email not found in our records.
errors.email_not_found_signup: Email not found. Please sign up first.

success.reset_sent: Password reset link sent! Check your email.
success.signup_confirm: Success! Check your email for the confirmation link! Some times it can take a few minutes to arrive.

clubs.select_club: Select Club where you played the match

badges.info: Based on matches played in the last 30 days

home.confirm_prompt: Confirm this match result? This will update ELO ratings.
home.reject_reason_prompt: Please provide a reason for rejecting this match (Required):
home.reject_confirm: Reject this game? It will be deleted. You can always create a new one. But remember that rejecting it to avoid a drop in your ELO rating may result in a temporary suspension.
home.subscription_expired_alert: Your subscription has expired. Please renew to access tournaments.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.points_info: The points do not affect the level or ranking.
profile.upload_error: Error uploading avatar. Please try again.

synergy.title: Partner Chemistry
synergy.unknown_desc: Play more matches to establish chemistry

rivalry.unknown_desc: Play more matches to establish rivalry
rivalry.nemesis_desc: They have your number... for now

common.confirm_prompt: Are you sure you want to proceed?
common.beta_message: This app is in beta period.

new_match.title: Select Players
new_match.fair_play: Please ensure scores are recorded fairly. If an admin detects false records, the match will be deleted and ELO points reverted to maintain a fair and real community. The user may be temporarily banned if necessary.
new_match.score_hint: Enter the result in games (e.g., 6-3, 6-4). Use the third set if there is a tie. If it is decided by a tiebreak, record it as 7-6.
new_match.match_notes_placeholder: Describe the match... (e.g., 'Epic comeback!', 'Windy day', 'Great rally')
new_match.verification_note: The match will be sent to the opponents to verify the result. (If ignored, it will be automatically accepted after 24 hours.)
new_match.success_alert: Match submitted! Opponents have 24h to confirm the result.
new_match.enter_valid_result: Please enter a valid result (at least two sets played).
new_match.cannot_be_draw: Match cannot end in a draw.
new_match.duplicate_match: It looks like this match has already been recorded recently (range: 2 hours ago) by another player. No need to duplicate it. Please be fair :)
new_match.invite_friends: No players found. Invite friends to Sign Up!
new_match.invalid_set_scoreinvalid_set_score: Invalid set score. Someone must reach 6 or 7 games.
new_match.invalid_7_score: Invalid score (7-x). Loser must have 5 or 6 games.
new_match.invalid_6_score: Invalid score (6-x). If opponent has 5 or more, you must play to 7.
new_match.invalid_7_7: 7-7 is not a valid score. You must play a tie-break (7-6).
new_match.minimum_sets_required: A match must consist of at least 2 sets.
new_match.match_already_finished: Match already finished after 2 sets. You cannot enter a 3rd set.
new_match.must_include_self: You must be a participant to create a match.

admin.title: Admin Console
admin.confirm_delete_match: This will DELETE the match and REVERT ELO points for all players. Are you sure?
admin.confirm_delete_player: Are you sure? This might not be undone!
admin.direct_entry_warning: DIRECT ENTRY: This match will be confirmed IMMEDIATELY and ELOs updated.
admin.match_created_success: Match created and validated successfully! ELO updated.
admin.delete_old_msgs_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete messages older than {{days}} days?
admin.delete_old_msgs_confirm_count: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} messages older than {{days}} days? This action cannot be undone.
admin.maintenance_desc: Delete old messages to free up database space. This action is irreversible.
admin.confirm_delete_tournament: This will delete the tournament and all its data permanently. Are you sure?
admin.search_tournament_placeholder: Search tournament by name or ID...
admin.no_matches_tournament: No matches found for this tournament.
admin.mark_completed_message: Do you want to mark this match as completed?

rankings.title: Leaderboard
rankings.subtitle: Top players in the community
rankings.no_results: No players found matching your search.
rankings.no_friends: No friends found. Go to 'Community' to add some!
rankings.click_hint: Click on a player to see more details
rankings.fire_motivation: Win 3 matches in a row to set your avatar on fire! üî•

tournament_rankings.title: Tournament Rankings
tournament_rankings.subtitle: Top players from only public tournaments

tournaments.title: Tournaments
tournaments.subtitle: Manage your Americano & Mexicano events
tournaments.enter_name: Enter a name for your event
tournaments.delete_tournament_description: This will delete the tournament and all its matches permanently.
tournaments.delete_confirm: This will delete the tournament and all its matches permanently.
tournaments.participants_only: Only participants can enter while playing
tournaments.verification_pending_desc: This tournament is awaiting confirmation from an administrator before appearing in the rankings.

visibility.public_note: IMPORTANT: Only public tournaments will count towards the ranking. At the end, they will remain pending confirmation by an administrator.

modes.americano_desc: üîÑ Americano: Partners rotate each round so you play with every participant. Social and inclusive format.
modes.mexicano_desc: üìä Mexicano: Players are paired based on current rankings. Top performers face each other, creating competitive matches at all levels.
modes.americano_full: Rotating partners. Play with everyone in the tournament.
modes.mexicano_full: Performance-based pairing. Top scorers play together.

setup.must_participate_desc: As the creator, you must be a participant in this tournament.
setup.invalid_player_count: Could not generate matches. Ensure player count is valid (multiple of 4 for Americano).

play.finish_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to finish this tournament? Once finished, you cannot edit matches or add new rounds.
play.cycle_complete_message:
Everyone has played everyone! (Round {{current}} / {{max}}).

Do you want to finish the tournament now?
play.mexicano_cycle_message:
Difficult, but it happened. Everyone has partnered with everyone at least once! (Round {{current}}).

Do you want to finish the tournament now?
play.verification_pending_message: Your tournament has been submitted for admin verification. You will be notified once it is approved.
play.tournament_completed_message: Your tournament has been completed successfully.

results.report_issue_message: Please describe the issue with this tournament:
results.report_issue_placeholder: e.g., Incorrect scores, wrong participants, etc.
results.issue_reported_message: Your issue has been reported to the administrators. Thank you for your feedback.

community.title: Community
community.subtitle: Manage your network
community.no_friends: No friends yet. Find them in Community!

history.title: Match History
history.search_placeholder: Search by player or Match Id...

levels.title: ELO Levels
levels.subtitle_2:
If a user wants to adjust their level to a lower one, they can request it in the support email. Always with sense.

 For example: at the start of using the app, they don't want to start with 1150 ELO (level 3).

pending.title: Account Pending Approval
pending.message: Thanks for joining PadelUp! To maintain the quality of our community, all new accounts must be approved by an administrator.
pending.what_happens_desc: Your request has been sent to the admin. You will receive an email or can check back here once your account is active.

subscription.title: Subscription Expired
subscription.message: Your membership has expired. To continue using PadelUp, please renew your subscription.
subscription.payment_instructions: Please send the support via PayPal to:
subscription.contribution_note: This small contribution keeps the system running and improving the community. Thank you very much.
subscription.disclaimer: By clicking confirming, you agree that you have sent the support. False confirmations may lead to account suspension.
subscription.error: Error updating subscription. Please try again.

banned.title: Account temporarily suspended
banned.message: Your account has been blocked for several possible reasons:
banned.contact_admin: Please contact an administrator or send your case to support

chat.title: Messages
chat.start_chatting_hint: Find a player in the Community tab to start chatting!
chat.confirm_delete_conversation: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? It will only be deleted for you.
chat.cleanup_disclaimer:
Messages older than 90 days can be deleted for security.
Conversations are encrypted and 100% private.

welcome_modal.title: Welcome to PadelUp
welcome_modal.subtitle: More than just a padel community.
welcome_modal.value_1_desc: Honest scoring is the heart of our ranking system. Accurate results ensure real statistics and fair matchmaking for everyone.
welcome_modal.value_2_desc: Use real data to improve your game. Challenge yourself, unlock achievements, and climb the leaderboard.
welcome_modal.value_3_desc: After the test period, your monthly subscription keeps PadelUp alive and evolving. It directly supports new features and new functions.

push_prompt.title: Enable Notifications
push_prompt.description: Don't miss news or chat messages from your community. Enable push notifications to stay updated! Very useful for contacting other players.

install_prompt.title: Install App on Screen
install_prompt.ios_instruction: In Safari, tap the three dots icon, then the option more, then tap Add to Home Screen.
install_prompt.android_instruction: In Chrome, tap the menu icon and then Install App.
install_prompt.ios_instruction_footer: Access your PadelUp with one touch. It is recommended to perform this step to improve the user experience.

info_modal.title: How PadelUp Works
info_modal.step_1_desc: Press the '+' button to log a new match result.
info_modal.step_2_desc: Important: You can only select players who are already registered in the app. Invite friends to join to track stats together.
info_modal.step_3_desc: Your opponent will see in his home screen the match to confirm the score. true! Auto confirmation after 24h

cookie_banner.text: We use cookies to improve your experience. By continuing to visit this site you agree to our use of cookies.

terms_update_modal.title: Terms & Privacy Update
terms_update_modal.message: We have updated our legal documents to comply with GDPR and local regulations. Please review and accept the new Terms of Service and Privacy Policy to continue using PadelUp.

privacy_policy_content.section1_text: The following notes provide a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is all data with which you can be personally identified.
privacy_policy_content.section2_text: We host our website content with the following providers:
privacy_policy_content.section2_text_2: Provider is Supabase, Inc. We use Supabase for database and authentication. Data is stored on servers in the EU (AWS region eu-west-1, Ireland).
privacy_policy_content.section3_text: The operators of these pages take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations and this privacy policy.
privacy_policy_content.section3_text_2:
The responsible body for data processing on this website is:

Alvaro Barcelona Peralta
Ratsbleiche 4
38114, Brunswick, Germany
Email: padeluppadeleros@gmail.com
privacy_policy_content.section4_text: You can register on this website to use additional functions on the site. We only use the data entered for this purpose for the purpose of using the respective offer or service for which you have registered. The mandatory information requested during registration must be provided in full. Otherwise, we will reject the registration.

impressum_content.section1_text:
PadelUp

impressum_content.section3_text: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with general laws pursuant to ¬ß 7 Para.1 TMG. According to ¬ß¬ß 8 to 10 TMG, however, we as a service provider are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
impressum_content.section4_text: Our offer contains links to external third-party websites, on whose contents we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages.
impressum_content.section5_text: The content and works on these pages created by the site operators are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, processing, distribution, and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator.

terms_content.section1_text: The following Terms and Conditions (GTC) apply to the use of this app.
terms_content.section2_text: PadelUp provides a platform for recording padel matches and calculating rankings based on an ELO system.
terms_content.section3_text: Use of the app requires registration. The user is obliged to provide truthful information.
terms_content.section4_text: Users commit to fair behavior. Manipulation of game results leads to blocking.
terms_content.section5_text: The contract runs for an indefinite period and can be terminated by the user at any time by deleting the account.
terms_content.section6_text: We are not liable for damages resulting from the use of the app, unless there is intent or gross negligence.
